## useDigitizer() function

Create a digiter that can be used to convert a string into arrays of individual characters.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useDigitizer(): DigitizerContext;
```
**Returns:**

[DigitizerContext](./flipclock.digitizercontext.md)
